item.title: Kernel multiclass support vector machine solvers
item.description: In this previous post, we listed solvers for SVMs. The focus of this post is specialized to solvers for the Crammer-Singer and Weston-Watkins kernel SVMs. Shark Solves both Relevant papers Igel, Heidrich-Meisner, and Glasmachers (2008) is the paper that introduced the Shark package. (link to paper) Dogan, Glasmachers, and Igel (2011) introduces S2DO. (link to paper) Glasmachers and Dogan (2013) introduces ACF. link to paper Do«ßan, Glasmachers, and Igel (2016) performs empirical studies of several SVM variants link to paper

item.title: The Weston-Watkins SVM dual problem
item.description: Set-up and notations Primal problem Dual problem Expression for the dual problem Derivatives Coordinate descent in Shark Update of a single block dual variable Computing the step vector Greedy step size In this blog post, we derive the dual problem for the Weston-Watkins support vector machine (SVM). The dual optimization for the Weston-Watkins SVM can be found in the literature, e.g., Keerthi et al. (2008) and Weston and Watkins (1999).

item.title: SVM solver jargons
item.description: The dual of the SVM without offset: \[ \max_{\alpha_1,\dots, \alpha_n} \sum_{i=1}^n \alpha_i - \frac{1}{2}\sum_{i,j=1}^n \alpha_i \alpha_j k(x_i,x_j) \quad \mbox{s.t.}\quad 0 \le \alpha_i \le C,\, \forall i=1,\dots,n \quad \quad \quad (QP)\] Decomposition Optimizing \((QP)\) one \(\alpha_i\), or a few \(\alpha_i\)s, at a time. Working set selection The set \(I \subseteq \{1,\dots, n\}\) of dual variables that the decomposition optimization algorithm consider at a given time. Shrinking During optimization using decomposition method, a dual variable may converges to \(\alpha_i = 0\) or \(\alpha_i = C\) and stays there.

item.title: A non-exhaustive list of SVM solvers
item.description: Libraries Shark Shogun Exact SVM solvers LIBSVM LIBLINEAR liquidSVM Pegasos LASVM SVMLight Hierarchical solvers ThunderSVM cuML SVM LPSVM Approximate SVM solvers DC-SVM EnsembleSVM BudgetedSVM GPU GTSVM OHD-SVM Multiclass MSVMpack BSVM LaRank GaLa: Improved Working Set Selection for LaRank Crammer-Singer SVM Disclaimers: Please email me if there is any mistake or a solver should be added here. Some solvers belong to multiple categories.

Brooks, Christopher T. Lee, Clayton Scott, Laura Balzano, Max S. Wicha, and Justin A. Colacino Frontiers in Cell and Developmental Biology.
